revision.text:
{{codepointer|Sound}}'''A_VileStart''' {{doomwiki|A_VileStart}}
(no parameters)
{{superseded|A_StartSound}}
==Usage== Plays the sound "vile/start" on the Voice channel.
== Examples ==
The following two [[DECORATE]] code blocks are equivalent.
... MONS HI 5 MONS J 5 [[A_VileStart]] ...
... MONS HI 5 MONS J 5 [[A_PlaySound]]("vile/start", {{const|CHAN_VOICE}}) ...
